Gastro Acid.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the foe. The fluid eliminates the effect of the foe’s ability.

Taunt.description: The foe is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for two to four turns.

Metal Burst.description: The user retaliates against the foe that last inflicted damage on it with much greater power.

Pursuit.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a foe that is switching out of battle.

Thunder.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

Blaze Kick.description: The user launches a kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Spider Web.description: The user ensnares the foe with a thin, gooey silk so it can’t flee from battle.

Arm Thrust.description: The user looses a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

Worry Seed.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its ability Insomnia.

Refresh.description: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

Energy Ball.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

Wood Hammer.description: The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.

Sketch.description: It enables the user to learn a move used by the foe. Once used, the move Sketch disappears.

Selfdestruct.description: The user blows up to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

Acupressure.description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats.

Gust.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the foe to inflict damage.

Transform.description: The user transforms into a copy of the foe right down to having the same move set.

Aura Sphere.description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body. This move is certain to hit.

Dragon Claw.description: The user slashes the foe with huge, sharp claws.

Stone Edge.description: The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Psychic.description: The foe is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

Splash.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

Lovely Kiss.description: With a scary face, the user forces a kiss on the foe. It may make the target fall asleep.

Rollout.description: The user continually rolls into the foe over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

Belly Drum.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

Trick Room.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

Pluck.description: The user pecks the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user plucks it and gains its effect.

Flatter.description: Flattery is used to confuse the foe. However, it also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

Extrasensory.description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It may also make the foe flinch.

Stealth Rock.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

Nature Power.description: An attack that makes use of nature’s power. Its effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

Supersonic.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

Pain Split.description: The user adds its HP to the foe’s HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the foe.

Aerial Ace.description: The user confounds the foe with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.

Icy Wind.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

Swagger.description: The user enrages the foe into confusion. However, it also sharply raises the foe’s Attack stat.

Heal Bell.description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon.

Bonemerang.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the foe twice, coming and going.

Wing Attack.description: The foe is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

Night Shade.description: The user makes the foe see a mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user’s level.

Constrict.description: The foe is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target’s Speed.

Needle Arm.description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. It may also make the target flinch.

Lick.description: The foe is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also paralyze the target.

Sing.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the foe into a deep slumber.

Ominous Wind.description: The user creates a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

Scary Face.description: The user frightens the foe with a scary face to sharply reduce its Speed stat.

Muddy Water.description: The user attacks by shooting out muddy water. It may also lower the foe’s accuracy.

Present.description: The user attacks by giving the foe a booby-trapped gift. It restores HP sometimes, however.

Water Spout.description: The user spouts water to damage the foe. The lower the user’s HP, the less powerful it becomes.

Psycho Boost.description: The user attacks the foe at full power. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

Hammer Arm.description: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

Shadow Sneak.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the foe from behind. This move always goes first.

Barrage.description: Round objects are hurled at the foe to strike two to five times in a row.

Volt Tackle.description: The user electrifies itself, then charges at the foe. It causes considerable damage to the user as well.

Softboiled.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally’s HP.

Curse.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all the other types.

Poison Tail.description: An attack with a high critical-hit ratio. This tail  attack may also  poison the foe.

Struggle.description: An attack that is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also hurts the user slightly.

False Swipe.description: A restrained attack that prevents the foe from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

Knock Off.description: The user slaps down the foe’s held item, preventing the item from being used during the battle.

Confusion.description: The foe is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the foe confused.

Mud Sport.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric- type moves while the user is in the battle.

Dig.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

Sunny Day.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

Rock Slide.description: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.

Double-Edge.description: A reckless, life- risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

Bullet Seed.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.

Light Screen.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

Rapid Spin.description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

Take Down.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the foe. It also damages the user a little.

Fake Out.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. This move works only on the first turn.

Iron Tail.description: The foe is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

Power Whip.description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the foe.

Charm.description: The user charmingly stares at the foe, making it less wary. The target’s Attack is sharply lowered.

Spikes.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the foe’s feet. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

Metronome.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates the brain into randomly using nearly any move.

Baton Pass.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

Cotton Spore.description: The user releases cottonlike spores that cling to the foe, sharply reducing its Speed stat.

Rolling Kick.description: The user cuts a quick spin and lashes out with a sharp kick.

Razor Wind.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit the foe on the second turn. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Swallow.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP.

Zen Headbutt.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and rams the foe. It may also make the target flinch.

Brick Break.description: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

Stomp.description: The foe is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

Flamethrower.description: The foe is scorched with an intense blast of fire. The target may also be left with a burn.

Super Fang.description: The user chomps hard on the foe with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target’s HP to half.

Water Pulse.description: The user attacks the foe with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the foe.

Bug Buzz.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

Mirror Coat.description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

Natural Gift.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

Meditate.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

Night Slash.description: The user slashes the foe the instant an opportunity arises. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Feint.description: An attack that hits a foe using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

SmellingSalt.description: This attack inflicts double damage on a paralyzed foe. It also cures the foe’s paralysis, however.

Metal Claw.description: The foe is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

Gunk Shot.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target.

Gyro Ball.description: The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

Barrier.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

Skull Bash.description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the foe on the next turn.

Pay Day.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. Money is earned after battle.

Thunderbolt.description: A strong electric blast is loosed at the foe. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.

Mirror Move.description: The user counters the foe by mimicking the move last used by the foe.

Tail Whip.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making the foe less wary. The target’s Defense stat is lowered.

Embargo.description: It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

Defense Curl.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

Aeroblast.description: A vortex of air is shot at the foe to inflict damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Last Resort.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

Meteor Mash.description: The foe is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user’s Attack.

Horn Attack.description: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

Torment.description: The user torments and enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

Quick Attack.description: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

Whirlpool.description: The user traps the foe inside a fast, vicious whirlpool that lasts for two to five turns.

Peck.description: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

Cosmic Power.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Gravity.description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitation.

Healing Wish.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

Substitute.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.

Strength.description: The foe is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. It can also be used to move boulders.

Draco Meteor.description: Comets are summoned down from the sky. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

Captivate.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

Heart Swap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the foe.

Spark.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the foe. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

Spore.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

Dizzy Punch.description: The foe is hit with rhythmically launched punches that may also leave it confused.

Block.description: The user blocks the foe’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

Reflect.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

Crush Grip.description: The foe is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the foe has left.

Focus Blast.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

Sludge.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the foe. It may also poison the target.

Hyper Beam.description: The foe is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

Poison Fang.description: The user bites the foe with toxic fangs. It may also leave the foe badly poisoned.

Tail Glow.description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, sharply raising its Sp. Atk stat.

Crunch.description: The user crunches up the foe with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

Mimic.description: The user copies the move last used by the foe. The move can be used for the rest of the battle.

PoisonPowder.description: A cloud of poisonous dust is scattered on the foe. It may poison the target.

Psycho Shift.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

Spit Up.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack.

Blast Burn.description: The foe is razed by a fiery explosion. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

Air Slash.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

Power Swap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the foe.

Imprison.description: If the foe knows any move also known by the user, the foe is prevented from using it.

ViceGrip.description: Huge, impressive pincers grip and squeeze the foe.

Fire Punch.description: The foe is punched with a fiery fist. It may leave the target with a burn.

Morning Sun.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

Petal Dance.description: The user attacks by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

Dragon Rage.description: The foe is stricken by a shock wave. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

Assist.description: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by other Pokémon in the party.

Poison Gas.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the foe’s face. It may poison the target.

Cut.description: The foe is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.

Magnet Rise.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

Shadow Force.description: The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn. It hits even if the foe used Protect.

Fling.description: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

Will-O-Wisp.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish white flame at the foe to inflict a burn.

Egg Bomb.description: A large egg is hurled with maximum force at the foe to inflict damage.

Odor Sleuth.description: Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

Seismic Toss.description: The foe is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

Fissure.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the foe in. The target instantly faints if it hits.

Sand Tomb.description: The user traps the foe inside a harshly raging sandstorm for two to five turns.

Sharpen.description: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.

Drain Punch.description: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Spike Cannon.description: Sharp spikes are fired at the foe to strike two to five times in rapid succession.

Mist Ball.description: A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk.

Leaf Blade.description: The foe is slashed with a sharp leaf. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Close Combat.description: The user fights the foe in close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user’s Defense and Sp. Def.

Pin Missile.description: Sharp pins are shot at the foe in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Clamp.description: The foe is clamped and squeezed by the user’s very thick and sturdy shell for two to five turns.

Flail.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

Power Trick.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

Signal Beam.description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target.

Sky Attack.description: A second-turn attack move with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also make the target flinch.

Wish.description: A self-healing move. The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP in the next turn.

Bullet Punch.description: The user strikes with a tough punch as fast as a bullet. This move always goes first.

Brine.description: If the foe’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

Sand-Attack.description: Sand is hurled in the foe’s face, reducing its accuracy.

Brave Bird.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.

Low Kick.description: A powerful low kick that makes the foe fall over. It inflicts greater damage on heavier foes.

Bite.description: The foe is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

Zap Cannon.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

Hyper Fang.description: The user bites hard on the foe with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.

Roar of Time.description: The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.

Discharge.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike all Pokémon in battle. It may also cause paralysis.

Dark Void.description: The foe is dragged into a world of total darkness that puts it to sleep.

Rock Tomb.description: Boulders are hurled at the foe. It also lowers the foe’s Speed by preventing its movement.

Leech Life.description: A blood-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Heal Order.description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

Acid.description: The foe is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

Foresight.description: Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

Hyper Voice.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

Sleep Talk.description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

Rage.description: While this move is in use, it gains attack power each time the user is hit in battle.

Defog.description: Obstacles are moved, reducing the foe’s evasion stat. It can also be used to clear deep fog, etc.

Pound.description: The foe is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

Flame Wheel.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Psybeam.description: The foe is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also leave the target confused.

Hail.description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

Thunder Wave.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the foe. It causes paralysis if it hits.

Toxic Spikes.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the foe’s feet. They poison foes that switch into battle.

Mach Punch.description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.

BubbleBeam.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.

Glare.description: The user intimidates the foe with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

Flash.description: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.

Horn Drill.description: The foe is stabbed with a horn rotating like a drill. The foe instantly faints if it hits.

Reversal.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

Perish Song.description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns unless it switches out of battle.

Fury Swipes.description: The foe is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

Chatter.description: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the foe.

Tailwind.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for three turns.

Bubble.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.

Haze.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

Wake-Up Slap.description: This attack inflicts high damage on a sleeping foe. It also wakes the foe up, however.

Psych Up.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.

Air Cutter.description: The user launches razorlike wind to slash the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Stun Spore.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may paralyze the target.

Judgment.description: The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.

Mud Shot.description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the foe. It also reduces the target’s Speed.

Twister.description: The user whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe. It may also make the foe flinch.

Return.description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

Amnesia.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

Snatch.description: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat- changing move the foe attempts to use.

Secret Power.description: The user attacks with a secret power. Its added effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

Twineedle.description: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.

Aqua Tail.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

Spacial Rend.description: The user tears the foe along with the space around it. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

Mist.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

ExtremeSpeed.description: The user charges the foe at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

Ice Shard.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them. This move always goes first.

Comet Punch.description: The foe is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

Trump Card.description: The fewer PP this move has, the more power it has for attack.

Superpower.description: The user attacks the foe with great power. However, it also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense.

Miracle Eye.description: Enables the user to hit a Dark type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

Shadow Ball.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the foe. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

Weather Ball.description: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.

Fire Blast.description: The foe is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Lock-On.description: The user takes sure aim at the foe. It ensures the next attack does not fail to hit the target.

Ice Fang.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or freeze.

Triple Kick.description: A consecutive three- kick attack that becomes more powerful with each  successive hit.

Teeter Dance.description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses all the Pokémon in battle.

Charge.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses next. It also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

Revenge.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

DynamicPunch.description: The foe is punched with the user’s full, concentrated power. It confuses the foe if it hits.

Bone Rush.description: The user strikes at the foe with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

Fury Cutter.description: The foe is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.

Recycle.description: The user recycles a single-use item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

DragonBreath.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also paralyze the target.

Charge Beam.description: The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

Headbutt.description: The user sticks its head out and rams straight forward. It may make the foe flinch.

Magnitude.description: The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone in battle. Its power varies.

Conversion 2.description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack it last took.

Sandstorm.description: A five-turn sand- storm is summoned to hurt all combatant types except Rock,  Ground, and Steel.

Swift.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the foe. This attack never misses.

Defend Order.description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Ice Beam.description: The foe is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

Dragon Pulse.description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

Toxic.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

X-Scissor.description: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

Iron Defense.description: The user hardens its body’s surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

Bide.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

Waterfall.description: The user charges the foe at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

Flash Cannon.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

Withdraw.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

Iron Head.description: The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

Counter.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

Camouflage.description: The user’s type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in a cave.

Steel Wing.description: The foe is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user’s Defense stat.

Bone Club.description: The user clubs the foe with a bone. It may also make the target flinch.

Magical Leaf.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the foe. This attack will not miss.

Force Palm.description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

Trick.description: The user catches the foe off guard and swaps the foe’s held item with its own.

Rock Climb.description: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.

Dragon Rush.description: The user tackles the foe while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

Sky Uppercut.description: The user attacks the foe with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

Crush Claw.description: The user slashes the foe with hard and sharp claws. It may also lower the target’s Defense.

Magma Storm.description: The foe becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for two to five turns.

Fury Attack.description: The foe is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

Ingrain.description: The user lays roots that restore HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can’t switch out.

Guillotine.description: A vicious, tearing attack with pincers. The foe will faint instantly if this attack hits.

Heal Block.description: The user prevents the foe from using any HP-recovery moves for five turns.

Water Sport.description: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

Poison Sting.description: The foe is stabbed with a poisonous barb of some sort. It may also poison the target.

Synthesis.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

Whirlwind.description: The foe is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Doom Desire.description: Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the foe with a concentrated bundle of light.

Screech.description: An earsplitting screech is emitted to sharply reduce the foe’s Defense stat.

Attack Order.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Sucker Punch.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the foe is not readying an attack, however.

Nightmare.description: A sleeping foe is shown a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

Ember.description: The foe is attacked with small flames. The target may also be left with a burn.

Fake Tears.description: The user feigns crying to make the foe feel flustered, sharply lowering its Sp. Def stat.

Thief.description: The user attacks and steals the foe’s held item simultaneously. It can’t steal if the user holds an item.

Giga Impact.description: The user charges at the foe using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

Fire Spin.description: The foe becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for two to five turns.

String Shot.description: The foe is bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth. It reduces the target’s Speed stat.

Shock Wave.description: The user strikes the foe with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.

Facade.description: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, paralyzed, or has a burn.

Flare Blitz.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. The user sustains serious damage, too.

Wring Out.description: The user powerfully wrings the foe. The more HP the foe has, the greater this attack’s power.

Explosion.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

Surf.description: It swamps the entire battlefield with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.

Powder Snow.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the target.

Hydro Cannon.description: The foe is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

SmokeScreen.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the foe’s accuracy.

Lucky Chant.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing the foe from landing critical hits.

Body Slam.description: The user drops onto the foe with its full body weight. It may leave the foe paralyzed.

Karate Chop.description: The foe is attacked with a sharp chop. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Frenzy Plant.description: The foe is slammed with an enormous tree. The user can’t move on the next turn.

Agility.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

ThunderPunch.description: The foe is punched with an electrified fist. It may leave the target with paralysis.

Attract.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

Vacuum Wave.description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the foe. This move always goes first.

Mega Kick.description: The foe is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

Memento.description: The user faints upon using this move. In return, it sharply lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk.

Vine Whip.description: The foe is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

Grass Knot.description: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.

Growth.description: The user’s body is forced to grow all at once. It raises the Sp. Atk stat.

Magnet Bomb.description: The user launches a steel bomb that sticks to the target. This attack will not miss.

Covet.description: The user endearingly approaches the foe, then steals the item the foe is holding.

Recover.description: A self-healing move. The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

Rock Smash.description: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. It can also smash cracked boulders.

Hi Jump Kick.description: The foe is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

Kinesis.description: The user distracts the foe by bending a spoon. It may lower the target’s accuracy.

Copycat.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

Thrash.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

Avalanche.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

Tri Attack.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three- beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.

Encore.description: The user compels the foe to keep using only the move it last used for three to seven turns.

Rest.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status problem.

Smog.description: The foe is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

Wrap.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the foe for two to five turns.

Double Kick.description: The foe is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

Protect.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Growl.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the foe less wary. The target’s Attack stat is lowered.

Psycho Cut.description: The user tears at the foe with blades formed by psychic power. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Dive.description: A two-turn attack. The user dives underwater on the first turn, then hits on the next turn.

Frustration.description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

U-turn.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Seed Bomb.description: The user slams a barrage of hard- shelled seeds down on the foe from above.

Earthquake.description: The user sets off an earthquake that hits all the Pokémon in the battle.

Howl.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

Hidden Power.description: A unique attack that varies in type and intensity depending on the Pokémon using it.

Minimize.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller. The user’s evasion stat is boosted.

Tickle.description: The user tickles the foe into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

Safeguard.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

Power Gem.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

Poison Jab.description: The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the foe.

Earth Power.description: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

Harden.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

Endure.description: The user endures any attack, leaving 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Psywave.description: The foe is attacked with an odd, hot energy wave. The attack varies in intensity.

Hypnosis.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

Role Play.description: The user mimics the foe completely, copying the foe’s natural ability.

Mega Drain.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Ice Punch.description: The foe is punched with an icy fist. It may leave the target frozen.

Payback.description: If the user can use this attack after the foe attacks, its power is doubled.

Rock Polish.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

Ice Ball.description: The user continually rolls into the foe over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

Fire Fang.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or sustain a burn.

Double Team.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

Seed Flare.description: The user generates a shock wave from within its body. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

Vital Throw.description: The user allows the foe to attack first. In return, this throw move is guaranteed not to miss.

Double Hit.description: The user slams the foe with a tail, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.

DoubleSlap.description: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

Leaf Storm.description: A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

Guard Swap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the foe.

Sheer Cold.description: The foe is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The foe instantly faints if it hits.

Dream Eater.description: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.

Overheat.description: The user attacks the foe at full power. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

Rock Blast.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the foe. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

Endeavor.description: An attack move that cuts down the foe’s HP to equal the user’s HP.

Follow Me.description: The user draws attention to itself, making all foes take aim only at the user.

Mud-Slap.description: The user hurls mud in the foe’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

Jump Kick.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

Switcheroo.description: The user trades held items with the foe faster than the eye can follow.

Hydro Pump.description: The foe is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

Assurance.description: If the foe has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.

Head Smash.description: The user delivers a life-endangering head butt at full power. The user also takes terrible damage.

ThunderShock.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.

Moonlight.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

Cross Poison.description: A slashing attack that may also leave the target poisoned. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Mud Bomb.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

Swords Dance.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

Icicle Spear.description: The user launches sharp icicles at the foe. It strikes two to five times in a row.

Tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the foe with its whole body.

Teleport.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It may also be used to warp to the last Poké Center visited.

Outrage.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. However, it then becomes confused.

Focus Energy.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses to raise the critical-hit ratio of its attacks.

AncientPower.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

Conversion.description: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.

Calm Mind.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

Absorb.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Shadow Punch.description: The user throws a punch at the foe from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.

Dragon Dance.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

Helping Hand.description: A move that boosts the power of the ally’s attack in a Double Battle.

Mean Look.description: The user affixes the foe with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

Nasty Plot.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

Sludge Bomb.description: The user attacks by hurling filthy sludge at the foe. It may also poison the target.

Aromatherapy.description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user’s party.

Heat Wave.description: The user exhales a heated breath on the foe to attack. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Megahorn.description: Utilizing its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the foe  with no letup.

Rain Dance.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water- type moves.

Water Gun.description: The foe is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

Fly.description: The user soars, then strikes on the second turn. It can also be used for flying to any familiar town.

Sweet Scent.description: A sweet scent that lowers the foe’s evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

Me First.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the foe to steal and use the foe’s intended move with greater power.

Astonish.description: The user attacks the foe while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

Roost.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

GrassWhistle.description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the foe into a deep sleep.

Thunder Fang.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or become paralyzed.

Octazooka.description: The user attacks by spraying ink in the foe’s face or eyes. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

Sweet Kiss.description: The user kisses the foe with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

Mirror Shot.description: The user looses a flash of energy from its polished body. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

Destiny Bond.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the foe that landed the knockout hit also faints.

Leer.description: The foe is given an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The target’s Defense stat is reduced.

Roar.description: The foe is scared off, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Slash.description: The foe is attacked with a slash of claws, etc. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Magic Coat.description: A barrier reflects back to the foe moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

Slam.description: The foe is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

Giga Drain.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Milk Drink.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally’s HP.

Bind.description: A long body or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the foe for two to five turns.

Slack Off.description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.

Bug Bite.description: The user bites the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

Confuse Ray.description: The foe is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

Bulk Up.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.

Yawn.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the foe into falling asleep on the next turn.

Skill Swap.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange abilities with the foe.

Snore.description: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the foe flinch.

Bounce.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the foe on the second turn. It may also paralyze the foe.

FeatherDance.description: The user covers the foe with a mass of down that sharply lowers the Attack stat.

SonicBoom.description: The foe is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

Stockpile.description: The user charges up power, and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

Grudge.description: If the user faints, the user’s grudge fully depletes the PP of the foe’s move that knocked it out.

SolarBeam.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

Lunar Dance.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

Aqua Ring.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

Submission.description: The user grabs the foe and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.

Sleep Powder.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep- inducing dust around the foe.

Blizzard.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the foe. It may also freeze the target solid.

Detect.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Sacred Fire.description: The foe is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Leech Seed.description: A seed is planted on the foe. It steals some HP from the foe to heal the user on every turn.

Metal Sound.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal is emitted to sharply reduce the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

Future Sight.description: Two turns after this move is used, the foe is attacked with a hunk of psychic energy.

Mega Punch.description: The foe is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

Faint Attack.description: The user draws up to the foe disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

Crabhammer.description: The foe is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

Dark Pulse.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

Spite.description: The user looses its grudge on the move last used by the foe by cutting 4 PP from it.

Eruption.description: The user attacks in an explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the less powerful this attack becomes.

Silver Wind.description: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats.

Lava Plume.description: An inferno of scarlet flames washes over all Pokémon in battle. It may also inflict burns.

Beat Up.description: The user gets all the party Pokémon to attack the foe. The more party Pokémon, the more damage.

Focus Punch.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.

Aurora Beam.description: The foe is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. It may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

Razor Leaf.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Scratch.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the foe to inflict damage.

Drill Peck.description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

Rock Wrecker.description: The user launches a huge boulder at the foe to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.

Luster Purge.description: The user looses a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target’s Sp. Def stat.

Cross Chop.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Punishment.description: This attack’s power increases the more the foe has powered up with stat changes.

Disable.description: For several turns, this move prevents the foe from using the move it last used.

Mind Reader.description: The user senses the foe’s movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss.

Shadow Claw.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Aqua Jet.description: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

Rock Throw.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the foe to attack.

Uproar.description: The user attacks in an uproar for two to five turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

Acid Armor.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.
